sentences.en: He studied physics in Beijing University for two years.
sentences.cn: 他曾在北京大学物理系肄业两年.

sentences.en: He taught physics to the students at a college ten years ago.
sentences.cn: 十年前他在大学教物理.

sentences.en: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1985.
sentences.cn: 他于1985年被授予诺贝尔物理学奖。

sentences.en: He was the top student in physics.
His scientific discoveries are amenable to the laws of physics.
sentences.cn: 他在科学上的发现经得起物理定律的检验.

sentences.en: I wasn't too keen on physics and chemistry.
sentences.cn: 我对物理和化学不是太感喜爱。

sentences.en: I'm out of my depth when it comes nuclear physics.
sentences.cn: 我对原子核物理学一窍不通.

sentences.en: It is called series circuits in physics.
sentences.cn: 它在物理学上被称为串联电路.

sentences.en: Mathematical physics is an almost impossibly difficult subject.
sentences.cn: 数学物理是一门难得超乎想象的学科。

sentences.en: On balance, the book is a friendly, down-to-earth introduction to physics.
sentences.cn: 总而言之，这是一本通俗而务实的物理入门书。

sentences.en: Physics isn't just about pure science with no immediate applications.
sentences.cn: 物理学并非只是一门不能直接运用的纯科学。

sentences.en: the characterization of physics as the study of simplicity
sentences.cn: 把物理学界定为一门探求简单规律的学问

sentences.en: The quiz showed up Cane's weak points in physics.
sentences.cn: 这次测验看出了凯恩在物理学方面的弱点.

sentences.en: The scientist broke fresh ground in his recent book about physics.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家在他最近的物理学著作中提出了新的见解.

words.tran_cn: [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的
地文学，地相学；自然地理学；自然现象志

phrases.tran_cn: 凝聚态物理；凝聚物理学
n. 量子物理学；量子力学
空间物理，空间物理学；太空物理学

trans.tran_cn: 物理学，物理现象，物理成分
trans.tran_en: the science concerned with the study of physical objects and substances, and of natural forces such as light, heat, and movement
